requirements.shall: All serviceable joints shall be /FS (VCR-compatible); no PTFE or elastomer seals in wetted helium service.
Each /FS remake shall use a new metal gasket with batch traceability and tamper evidence.
/FS orientation shall be panel-female and module-male; deviations logged.
Panel interfaces shall be female and mobile modules male; deviations logged.
Small pneumatic/solenoid pilots shall be fail-open so loss of motive air does not obstruct manual isolation flow.
Leak acceptance shall meet Addendum Table 6 values using EN 13185 / ISO 20485 helium mass-spectrometer methods.
DBB plus eductor purge shall achieve residual air ≤0.05 % before breaking the joint.
QINFRA.S/QRB.S shall be protected at 1.3 bar(a) with PSV capacity ≥200 g/s @ 300 K routed to WCS.LP recovery.
Provide BD/PSV populations and setpoints as defined above with certified orifice capacity.
Implement tamper-evident ties and scan-based remake counting for every /FS connection.
Install dual helium analyzers (GAP.WCS and GAP.QRB) measuring H₂O and N₂ with ±1 ppm accuracy and ≤±1 ppm/year drift; maintain calibration certificates.
